attributes.action: Explore the feasibility of providing grants to all households to install Solar Panels thus reducing our dependency on the Energy Companies.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
WE, the people of the UK are now at the mercy of a small group of countries who supply Oil. We are also at the mercy of a small group of Multi -National energy suppliers who despite making vast profits are hell bent on raising Gas and Electricity prices to record high levels.
We the people of the UK require an alternative Independant supply of energy that frees us from the present suppliers of energy.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
